title: Cities Still in the Running for the 2024 Olympics
title_page: Cities Still in the Running for the 2024 Olympics - The New York Times
maintext:
Now that Boston's bid for the 2024 Summer Games is over, here is a look at the other cities eagerly seeking the Olympics.
It is unclear which, if any, cities from the United States will have a bid, but Los Angeles was the U.S.O.C. runner-up and would appear to have the edge.
The 2024 host city will be decided by the International Olympic Committee in 2017.
